the naked eye.translation[0].definitions: if you can see something with the naked eye, you can see it without using any artificial help such as a telescope or microscope
Itâ€™s just about possible to see the planet with the naked eye on a clear night.
Dust mites are tiny creatures, invisible to the naked eye.
the naked eye.translation[1].definitions: if you can see something with the naked eye, you can see it without using anything to help you, such as a telescope
Through his telescope he could see millions of stars that were invisible to the naked eye.
The mite is just visible to the naked eye.
